title: My PBE account was deactivated and I'm wondering if I can have it activated again.
body:
"You’re receiving this email because your PBE account isn’t linked to your League of Legends account. Unlinked PBE accounts like yours can’t be recovered if compromised! As a result, we're giving you an opportunity to create a more secure account from now until September 25. Either way, all unlinked PBE accounts will be deactivated by September 30, 11:59 PM PDT. To guarantee you get access to a fresh account, follow the instructions here:"

I linked my pbe account to my main account about 4 months ago or so and I'm surprised to have gotten this message since I linked my account.

I did not take any action when I saw this message because I felt I didn't need to. I attempted to log on to the pbe boards and the PBE client and to my surprise I was unable to log in to both. I'm wondering if it is too late to take action and get my PBE account activated once again. Any help on the matter would be greatly appreciated!

replies.body: I took a look at your account and it seems like the PBE account tied to your account is still active. Can you provide me with your *PBE Summoner Name* of the account you're having issues accessing?
My PBE Summoner Name is Hauntzer.

It looks like that's the unlinked old PBE account. Our records show a newer PBE account that **is linked** to your main account and is much newer. Can you try recovering your username for this account using the password recovery option inside the PBE client at the login screen?

It turns out that I had two accounts linked to this account but for some reason Hauntzer didn't count. It's clearly linked since I attempted to enter the username that was used to login for my PBE Summoner Name Hauntzer for the password recovery and it sent an email to this account's email. Is it possible to reactivate Hauntzer so I can link it to another account since I had all my friends and everything on that account? Technically it wasn't unlinked ): 

P.S. Thanks for the assistance!

Any account that was unlinked and part of the old PBE system (prior to 10/25/2013) cannot be reactivated. These accounts are part of a system we've migrated from and all new account are much more secure as part of our new system.

If you have any more questions or need assistance with your PBE account, feel free to reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where one of our account specialists will be able to assist.

I attempted to recover my password but to do so I need my account name which i don't know what it is. So I attempted to recover my username and entered the email linked to this account and haven't received an email yet. 

I then attempted to enter the username that was used to login for my PBE Summoner Name Hauntzer for the password recovery and it sent me an email to my Email which is linked to my live account "Blackie". Can you please assist me with this issue?
